WRITING.TEXT:
I'm not surprised by The Circle underperforming - the trailers weren't particularly intriguing, IMO, despite the impressive cast, and the reviews have been pretty bad. Apparently audiences really do not like it as well, judging by the D+ Cinemascore. Still, the movie was pretty low-budget, so Emma Watson, Ton Hanks, and everyone involved will end up fine.
Wow at Baahubali 2: The Conclusion and How to Be a Latin Lover. Both films are way over performing and are going to end the weekend with huge per-screen averages. Baahubali 2 might even outgross The Circle (or at least come very close to it).
